pkgmetadata.longdescription: How to use django_data_sdk in your django project=========================================================settings.INSTALLED_APPS--------------------------------------------.. code-block:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ # other apps ... "django_data_sdk", # other apps ... ]Install middleware to settings.MIDDLEWARE--------------------------------------------.. code-block:: python MIDDLEWARE = [ "django_data_sdk.middleware.DjangoDataTopMiddleware", # other middlewares "django_data_sdk.middleware.DjangoDataBottomMiddleware", ]Configure DJANGO_DATA related settings------------------------------------------.. code-block:: python DJANGO_DATA_SINK_SETTINGS = { "partition_prefix": "default_prefix", "partition_by": "request_time", # request_time, response_time in context, and put_time "partition_date_format": "%Y-%m-%d", # default interval day by day "app_secret": None, "backend": "django_data_sdk.sink.backends.DummyBackend", # DummyBackend or KafkaBackend "backend_kwargs": {}, "sink_mode": mode.DIRECT, # DIRECT or CELERY }Restart the service and check your data from the sink backend------------------------------------------------------------------
